title: Error when inferring a lifetime in return type using GATs

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: requires-nightly
labels.description: This issue requires a nightly compiler in some way.

body:
I tried this code: ```rust #![feature(generic_associated_types)] struct IntRef<'a>(&'a mut i32); trait Trait { type Ref<'a>; } impl Trait for () { type Ref<'a> = IntRef<'a>; } struct RefWrapper<'a, T: Trait>(&'a mut ::Ref<'a>); fn wrap<'a, T: Trait>(the_ref: &'a mut T::Ref<'a>) -> RefWrapper<'a, T> { RefWrapper(the_ref) } fn main() { let mut x = 3; let mut int_ref = IntRef(&mut x); let wrapper = wrap::<()>(&mut int_ref); *wrapper.0.0 = 2; } ``` I expected to see this happen: the code compiles Instead, this happened: the code does not compile unless you replace: ```rust RefWrapper(the_ref) ``` with ```rust RefWrapper::<'a, T>(the_ref) ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.51.0-nightly (a2f8f6281 2021-01-27) binary: rustc commit-hash: a2f8f6281817d430e20726128b739d3c6708561c commit-date: 2021-01-27 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.51.0-nightly LLVM version: 11.0.1 ```
Backtrace

``` warning: the feature `generic_associated_types` is incomplete and may not be safe to use and/or cause compiler crashes --> x.rs:1:12 | 1 | #![feature(generic_associated_types)] | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ | = note: `#[warn(incomplete_features)]` on by default = note: see issue #44265 for more information error[E0309]: the associated type `::Ref<'_>` may not live long enough --> x.rs:16:5 | 16 | RefWrapper(the_ref) | ^^^^^^^^^^ | = help: consider adding an explicit lifetime bound `::Ref<'_>: 'a`... = note: ...so that the type `::Ref<'_>` will meet its required lifetime bounds error[E0309]: the associated type `::Ref<'_>` may not live long enough --> x.rs:16:5 | 16 | RefWrapper(the_ref) | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ | = help: consider adding an explicit lifetime bound `::Ref<'_>: 'a`... = note: ...so that the type `::Ref<'_>` will meet its required lifetime bounds error: aborting due to 2 previous errors; 1 warning emitted For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0309`. ```
